bibl.title: P. Duk. inv. 677: Aetos, from Arsinoite Strategos to Eponymous Priest.
bibl.note: Arsinoite, viii 9, 202 BCE. Petition addressed to Aetos, the strategos of the Arsinoite nome. It is probable that Aetos is to be identified with Aetos son of Aetos, the eponymous priest of Alexander for 197/196, and the descendant of a long line of well-known Ptolemaic generals.
SOSIN Joshua D., P. Duk. inv. 677: Aetos, from Arsinoite Strategos to Eponymous Priest.
